name: Starlight Pearl
description: A shimmering pearl that seems to capture the essence of a shooting star. Its surface glimmers with an otherworldly light, as if it contains within it the secrets of the cosmos.

name: Lunar Fishing Rod
description: A delicate, crystal-tipped fishing rod that seems to have been crafted from the very essence of the moon. Its surface is adorned with intricate engravings that shimmer and shine in the soft light, and its tip appears to be imbued with a gentle, lunar magic.
